etymology.description: 大安 + 区 = the district named “Da’an.”
etymology.interpretation: Combines the auspicious toponym 大安 “great peace” with 区 “district” to name Taipei’s Da’an administrative district. Functions as a proper noun/place name.
etymology.simplification: 區 → 区 under PRC character simplification; Taiwan retains 區 for the official name, other parts unchanged.

examples.chinese: 我住在台北市的大安区(我住在臺北市的大安區)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ zhù zài Táiběi Shì de Dà’ān Qū.
examples.english: I live in Taipei City’s Da’an District.

examples.chinese: 大安区有许多大学和公园(大安區有許多大學和公園)。
examples.pinyin: Dà’ān Qū yǒu xǔduō dàxué hé gōngyuán.
examples.english: Da’an District has many universities and parks.

examples.chinese: 我们在大安区的捷运站见面(我們在大安區的捷運站見面)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen zài Dà’ān Qū de jiéyùn zhàn jiànmiàn.
examples.english: We’ll meet at an MRT station in Da’an District.
